Published January 4 2015

It just works?

It just works? — Marco Arment, writing about how Apple’s software is more buggy and unstable than it’s ever been. He postulates how this current state might be, in part, caused by Apple’s marketing team, which is pushing the limits of an already unmaintainable software release schedule.

Enjoy your day.
